        @NotNull
public Item getItemInSlot(int slot)

        Gets the item currently in the player's specified inventory slot. 0 for main hand, 1-4 for armor (2 for offhand in 1.12.2, and everything else shifted over).

        Parameters:
        slot - the slot to access
        Returns:
        the item in said slot
